info.name: MOTT ManagementAPI
info.description:
Usage:
- Import project "MOTT ManagementAPI" into Postman
- Create a Postman-environment for instance called RedBee OTT Production.
- Define the following variables: mgmtapihost, customer, businessunit, mgmtapiuser, mgmtapipwd, product, assetid and potentiall channelId, programId, publicationId, seriesId, seasonId.

The following values will probably be very static for you.
- mgmtapihost: https://managementapi.emp.ebsd.ericsson.net:443
- customer: The name of your customer.
- businessunit: The name of your business unit.
- mgmtapiuser. The API key id for your management API user.
- mgmtapipwd. The API key secret for your management API user.

The following values will probably change when you do different operations.
- assetId. This is the external asset id, unique for customer. Note that you must change if when doing different ingest, otherwise you will just replace the same asset.
- productId. The name of the product you want to use in your publications. You might want to use just one product or different. A good default value is free_product. That is a default product that is used to give access to all loged in users.
- channelId. Used when you want to perform operations for a live channel. 
- programId. Used when you want to perform operations for a live channel program.
- publicationId. Used when deleting a specific publication.
- seriesId. Used when you want to perform operations for a series.
- seasonid. Used when you want to perform operations for a season.

item.name: VOD Ingest
Standard Ingest

body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<publish-metadata xmlns="http://video-metadata.emp.ebsd.ericsson.net/publish-metadata/v1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://video-metadata.emp.ebsd.ericsson.net/publish-metadata/v1 publish-metadata-1.0.xsd">
    <data>
        <asset>
            <id>{{assetId}}</id>
            <titleList>
                <title language="en">Title for {{assetId}} in English</title>
            </titleList>
            <assetType>movie</assetType>
        </asset>
        <material>
            <materialRef>https://emptestdata.blob.core.windows.net/sources/Sintel/sintel.mp4</materialRef>
        </material>
    </data>
</publish-metadata>

request.description:
Use this when you want to perform a basic ingest without having any real meta-data available. You have one media file and multiple subtitle files.

It is assume that both the media source file and the subtitle files are available directly on internet.

Asset will not be published.

body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<publish-metadata xmlns="http://video-metadata.emp.ebsd.ericsson.net/publish-metadata/v1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://video-metadata.emp.ebsd.ericsson.net/publish-metadata/v1 publish-metadata-1.0.xsd">
    <data>
        <asset>
            <id>{{assetId}}</id>
            <titleList>
                <title language="en">Title for {{assetId}} in English</title>
                <title language="sv">Titel för {{assetId}} på Svenska</title>
            </titleList>
            <assetType>movie</assetType>
        </asset>
        <material>
            <materialRef>https://emptestdata.blob.core.windows.net/sources/Sintel/sintel.mp4</materialRef>
            <DRMEnabled>true</DRMEnabled>
            <subtitleList>
                <subtitle language="en">https://emptestdata.blob.core.windows.net/sources/Sintel/sintel_en.vtt</subtitle>
                <subtitle language="sv">https://emptestdata.blob.core.windows.net/sources/Sintel/sintel_se.vtt</subtitle>
                <subtitle language="ar">https://emptestdata.blob.core.windows.net/sources/Sintel/sintel_ar.vtt</subtitle>
                <subtitle language="no">https://emptestdata.blob.core.windows.net/sources/Sintel/sintel_no.vtt</subtitle>
            </subtitleList>
        </material>
    </data>
</publish-metadata>

request.description:
Use this when you want to perform a basic ingest without having any real meta-data available. You have one media file and multiple subtitle files.

It is assume that both the media source file and the subtitle files are available directly on internet.

Asset will not be published.

body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<publish-metadata xmlns="http://video-metadata.emp.ebsd.ericsson.net/publish-metadata/v1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://video-metadata.emp.ebsd.ericsson.net/publish-metadata/v1 publish-metadata-1.0.xsd">
    <data>
        <asset>
            <id>{{assetId}}</id>
            <titleList>
                <title language="en">Title for {{assetId}} in English</title>
                <title language="sv">Titel för {{assetId}} på Svenska</title>
            </titleList>
            <assetType>movie</assetType>
        </asset>
        <material>
            <materialRef>https://emptestdata.blob.core.windows.net/sources/Sintel/sintel.mp4</materialRef>
            <DRMEnabled>true</DRMEnabled>
            <subtitleList>
                <subtitle language="en">https://emptestdata.blob.core.windows.net/sources/Sintel/sintel_en.vtt</subtitle>
                <subtitle language="sv">https://emptestdata.blob.core.windows.net/sources/Sintel/sintel_se.vtt</subtitle>
                <subtitle language="ar">https://emptestdata.blob.core.windows.net/sources/Sintel/sintel_ar.vtt</subtitle>
                <subtitle language="no">https://emptestdata.blob.core.windows.net/sources/Sintel/sintel_no.vtt</subtitle>
            </subtitleList>
        </material>
        <publicationList>
    	    <publication>
        	    <id>SintelPubl</id>
        	    <startTime>2020-01-01T00:00:00.000Z</startTime>
        	    <endTime>2025-12-31T00:00:00.000Z</endTime>
        	    <publishTime>2021-01-01T00:00:00.000Z</publishTime>
        	    <publicationRights>
            	    <productList>
                	    <product>free_product</product>
            	    </productList>
        	    </publicationRights>
    	    </publication>
	    </publicationList>
    </data>
</publish-metadata>

request.description:
Use this when you want to perform a basic ingest without having any real meta-data available. You have one media file.

It is assumed that the media source file is available directly on internet.

Asset will be published. Note that this means that the asset might be available before it is actually ingested and playable so please consider the publication dates carefully.

body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<publish-metadata xmlns="http://video-metadata.emp.ebsd.ericsson.net/publish-metadata/v1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://video-metadata.emp.ebsd.ericsson.net/publish-metadata/v1 publish-metadata-1.0.xsd">
	<data>
		<asset>
    		<id>{{assetId}}</id>
    		<titleList>
    			<title language="en">Title for {{assetId}} in English</title>
    		</titleList>
    		<assetType>movie</assetType>
        </asset>
		<material>
            <!-- This assumes that we there is a predefined path configured in the system.-->
			<materialRef>Sintel/sintel.mp4</materialRef>
			<DRMEnabled>true</DRMEnabled>
		</material>
	</data>
</publish-metadata>

request.description:
Use this when you want to perform a basic ingest without having any real meta-data available. You have one media file.

It is assumed that the there is a storage location defined inside RedBee platform. This is why providing only relative paths are good enough. A storage can be defined either for a whole organization unit or for an organization when a specific provider is defined for the material.

Asset will not be published.

body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<publish-metadata xmlns="http://video-metadata.emp.ebsd.ericsson.net/publish-metadata/v1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://video-metadata.emp.ebsd.ericsson.net/publish-metadata/v1 publish-metadata-1.0.xsd">
	<data>
		<asset>
    		<id>{{assetId}}</id>
    		<titleList>
    			<title language="en">Title for {{assetId}} in English</title>
    		</titleList>
    		<assetType>movie</assetType>
        </asset>
		<material>
			<provider>PreDefinedProvider</provider>
			<materialRef>Sintel/sintel.mp4</materialRef>
            <DRMEnabled>false</DRMEnabled>
		</material>
	</data>
</publish-metadata>

request.description: Use this this base a new material on a already existing one to avoid incurring extra transcoding and storage costs

body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<publish-metadata xmlns="http://video-metadata.emp.ebsd.ericsson.net/publish-metadata/v1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://video-metadata.emp.ebsd.ericsson.net/publish-metadata/v1 publish-metadata-1.0.xsd">
    <data>
        <asset>
            <id>{{assetId}}</id>
            <!-- The provider must be configured in the system -->
            <provider>provider1</provider>
            <productionYear>2017</productionYear>
            <titleList>
                <title language="en">Title for {{assetId}} in Englisth</title>
                <title language="sv">Title for {{assetId}} in Swedish</title>
            </titleList>
            <descriptionList>
                <description language="en" length="short">A short description in English</description>
                <description language="sv" length="short">A short description in Swedish</description>
                <description language="en" length="medium">A medium description in English</description>
                <description language="sv" length="medium">A medium description in Swedish</description>
                <description language="en" length="long">A long description in English</description>
                <description language="sv" length="long">A long description in Swedish</description>
            </descriptionList>
            <!-- The tags must exist -->
            <tagList>
                <tagIdRef>genre_drama</tagIdRef>
                <tagIdRef>genre_thriller</tagIdRef>
            </tagList>
            <imageList>
            	 <image language="sv">
                    <id>image1</id>
                    <url>http://myhost.se/myPath/MyImageInSv.jpg</url>
                    <width>1280</width>
                    <height>720</height>
                    <purpose>banner</purpose>
                    <orientation>landscape</orientation>
                </image>
                <image language="en">
                    <id>image2</id>
                    <url>http://myhost.se/myPath/MyImageInEn.jpg</url>
                    <width>1280</width>
                    <height>720</height>
                    <purpose>banner</purpose>
                    <orientation>landscape</orientation>
                </image>
            </imageList>
            <!-- The parantal ratings must be pre-configured in the system -->
            <parentalRatingList>
                <parentalRating>
                    <rating>15</rating>
                    <scheme>age</scheme>
                    <country>GB</country>
                </parentalRating>
                <parentalRating>
                    <rating>15</rating>
                    <scheme>age</scheme>
                    <country>SE</country>
                </parentalRating>
            </parentalRatingList>
            <assetType>movie</assetType>
        </asset>
        <material>
            <materialRef>https://emptestdata.blob.core.windows.net/sources/Sintel/sintel.mp4</materialRef>
            <DRMEnabled>true</DRMEnabled>
        </material>
    </data>
</publish-metadata>

request.description:
Use this when you want to perform an ingest when localised data is available. You have one media file.

It is assumed that the media source file is available directly on internet.

Asset will not be published.

body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<publish-metadata xmlns="http://video-metadata.emp.ebsd.ericsson.net/publish-metadata/v1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://video-metadata.emp.ebsd.ericsson.net/publish-metadata/v1 publish-metadata-1.0.xsd">
    <data>
        <asset>
            <id>{{assetId}}</id>
            <titleList>
                <title language="en">Title for {{assetId}} in English</title>
                <title language="sv">Titel för {{assetId}} på Svenska</title>
            </titleList>
            <assetType>movie</assetType>
        </asset>
        <material>
            <materialRef>https://emptestdata.blob.core.windows.net/sources/Sintel/sintel.mp4</materialRef>
            <variants>
                <variant>
                	<id>america</id>
                    <profiles>
                        <profile>america</profile>
                    </profiles>
                    <subtitles>
                        <track>en</track>
                    </subtitles>
                </variant>
                 <variant>
                 	<id>europe</id>
                    <profiles>
                        <profile>europe</profile>
                    </profiles>
                    <subtitles>
                        <track>en</track>
                        <track>es</track>
                    </subtitles>
                </variant>
            </variants>
            <DRMEnabled>false</DRMEnabled>
            <subtitleList>
                <subtitle language="en">https://emptestdata.blob.core.windows.net/sources/shortbbb/bbb_eng_short.vtt</subtitle>
                <subtitle language="fr">https://emptestdata.blob.core.windows.net/sources/shortbbb/bbb_fre_short.vtt</subtitle>
        	    <subtitle language="de">https://emptestdata.blob.core.windows.net/sources/shortbbb/bbb_ger_short.vtt</subtitle>
                <subtitle language="es">https://emptestdata.blob.core.windows.net/sources/shortbbb/bbb_spa_short.vtt</subtitle>
                <subtitle language="sv">https://emptestdata.blob.core.windows.net/sources/shortbbb/bbb_sve_short.vtt</subtitle>
            </subtitleList>
        </material>
    </data>
</publish-metadata>

body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<publish-metadata xmlns="http://video-metadata.emp.ebsd.ericsson.net/publish-metadata/v1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://video-metadata.emp.ebsd.ericsson.net/publish-metadata/v1 publish-metadata-1.0.xsd">
    <data>
        <asset>
            <id>{{assetId}}</id>
            <titleList>
                <title language="en">Title for {{assetId}} in English</title>
                <title language="sv">Titel för {{assetId}} på Svenska</title>
            </titleList>
            <assetType>movie</assetType>
        </asset>
        <material>
            <materialRef>https://emptestdata.blob.core.windows.net/sources/Sintel/sintel.mp4</materialRef>
            <variant>
                	<id>america</id>
                    <profiles>
                        <profile>america</profile>
                    </profiles>
                    <subtitles included="false">
                        <track>en</track>
                        <track>fr</track>
                    </subtitles>
                    <audios included="true">
                        <track>en</track>
                    </audios>
                    <videos included="true">
                        <track>5000000</track>
                        <track>6800000</track>
                    </videos>
                </variant>
            <DRMEnabled>false</DRMEnabled>
            <subtitleList>
                <subtitle language="en">https://emptestdata.blob.core.windows.net/sources/shortbbb/bbb_eng_short.vtt</subtitle>
                <subtitle language="fr">https://emptestdata.blob.core.windows.net/sources/shortbbb/bbb_fre_short.vtt</subtitle>
        	    <subtitle language="de">https://emptestdata.blob.core.windows.net/sources/shortbbb/bbb_ger_short.vtt</subtitle>
                <subtitle language="es">https://emptestdata.blob.core.windows.net/sources/shortbbb/bbb_spa_short.vtt</subtitle>
                <subtitle language="sv">https://emptestdata.blob.core.windows.net/sources/shortbbb/bbb_sve_short.vtt</subtitle>
            </subtitleList>
        </material>
    </data>
</publish-metadata>

item.name: Asset - Variants For Video Max Bitrate

body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<publish-metadata xmlns="http://video-metadata.emp.ebsd.ericsson.net/publish-metadata/v1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://video-metadata.emp.ebsd.ericsson.net/publish-metadata/v1 publish-metadata-1.0.xsd">
    <data>
        <asset>
            <id>{{assetId}}</id>
            <titleList>
                <title language="en">Title for {{assetId}} in English</title>
                <title language="sv">Titel för {{assetId}} på Svenska</title>
            </titleList>
            <assetType>movie</assetType>
        </asset>
        <material>
            <materialRef>https://emptestdata.blob.core.windows.net/sources/Sintel/sintel.mp4</materialRef>
            <variants>
                <variant>
                	<id>america</id>
                    <profiles>
                        <profile>america</profile>
                    </profiles>
                    <maxBitrate>500000</maxBitrate>
                </variant>
            </variants>
            <DRMEnabled>false</DRMEnabled>
            <subtitleList>
                <subtitle language="en">https://emptestdata.blob.core.windows.net/sources/shortbbb/bbb_eng_short.vtt</subtitle>
                <subtitle language="fr">https://emptestdata.blob.core.windows.net/sources/shortbbb/bbb_fre_short.vtt</subtitle>
        	    <subtitle language="de">https://emptestdata.blob.core.windows.net/sources/shortbbb/bbb_ger_short.vtt</subtitle>
                <subtitle language="es">https://emptestdata.blob.core.windows.net/sources/shortbbb/bbb_spa_short.vtt</subtitle>
                <subtitle language="sv">https://emptestdata.blob.core.windows.net/sources/shortbbb/bbb_sve_short.vtt</subtitle>
            </subtitleList>
        </material>
    </data>
</publish-metadata>

item.name: Asset - Mov file - Audio Single Stereo

body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<publish-metadata xmlns="http://video-metadata.emp.ebsd.ericsson.net/publish-metadata/v1">
    <data>
    	 <asset>
            <id>{{assetId}}</id>
            <titleList>
                <title language="en">Title for {{assetId}} in English</title>
            </titleList>
            <assetType>movie</assetType>
        </asset>
        <material>
        	<materialRef>
				<audioList>
    				<audio channels="1" language="en" order="S"/><!-- track 1 is danish, stereo -->
				</audioList>
				http://movietrailers.apple.com/movies/lucasfilm/star-wars-the-rise-of-skywalker/star-wars-the-rise-of-skywalker-trailer-1_h1080p.mov
			</materialRef>
		</material>
    </data>
</publish-metadata>

request.description:
Use this when you want to perform a basic ingest without having any real meta-data available. You have one media file.

It is assumed that the media source file is available directly on internet.

Asset will be published. Note that this means that the asset might be available before it is actually ingested and playable so please consider the publication dates carefully.

body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<publish-metadata xmlns="http://video-metadata.emp.ebsd.ericsson.net/publish-metadata/v1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://video-metadata.emp.ebsd.ericsson.net/publish-metadata/v1 publish-metadata-1.0.xsd">
  <data>
	<material>
  		<materialRef>https://emptestdata.blob.core.windows.net/sources/Sintel/sintel.mp4</materialRef>
    	<assetIdRef>{{assetId}}</assetIdRef>
  		<DRMEnabled>false</DRMEnabled>
        <purgeDate>2022-01-01T10:00:00.000</purgeDate>
	</material>
  </data>
</publish-metadata>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<publish-metadata xmlns="http://video-metadata.emp.ebsd.ericsson.net/publish-metadata/v1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://video-metadata.emp.ebsd.ericsson.net/publish-metadata/v1 publish-metadata-1.0.xsd">
    <data>
        <material>
            <materialRef>https://emptestdata.blob.core.windows.net/sources/Sintel/sintel.mp4</materialRef>
            <variants>
                <variant>
                	<id>america</id>
                    <profiles>
                        <profile>america</profile>
                    </profiles>
                    <subtitles>
                        <track>en</track>
                    </subtitles>
                    <audios all="true"/>
                    <videos all="true"/>
                </variant>
                 <variant>
                 	<id>europe</id>
                    <profiles>
                        <profile>europe</profile>
                    </profiles>
                    <subtitles>
                        <track>en</track>
                        <track>es</track>
                    </subtitles>
                    <audios all="true"/>
                    <videos all="true"/>
                </variant>
            </variants>
            <assetIdRef>{{assetId}}</assetIdRef>
            <DRMEnabled>false</DRMEnabled>
            <subtitleList>
                <subtitle language="en">https://emptestdata.blob.core.windows.net/sources/shortbbb/bbb_eng_short.vtt</subtitle>
                <subtitle language="fr">https://emptestdata.blob.core.windows.net/sources/shortbbb/bbb_fre_short.vtt</subtitle>
        	    <subtitle language="de">https://emptestdata.blob.core.windows.net/sources/shortbbb/bbb_ger_short.vtt</subtitle>
                <subtitle language="es">https://emptestdata.blob.core.windows.net/sources/shortbbb/bbb_spa_short.vtt</subtitle>
                <subtitle language="sv">https://emptestdata.blob.core.windows.net/sources/shortbbb/bbb_sve_short.vtt</subtitle>
            </subtitleList>
        </material>
    </data>
</publish-metadata>

item.name: Material - Based On - Add Subtitle And Variant

body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<publish-metadata xmlns="http://video-metadata.emp.ebsd.ericsson.net/publish-metadata/v1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://video-metadata.emp.ebsd.ericsson.net/publish-metadata/v1 publish-metadata-1.0.xsd">
  <data>
    <material>
    	<materialRef>{{materialId}}</materialRef>
         <variants>
            <variant>
                <id>america</id>
                <profiles>
                    <profile>sv</profile>
                </profiles>
                <subtitles>
                    <track>en</track>
                </subtitles>
            </variant>
        </variants>
    	<assetIdRef>{{assetId}}</assetIdRef>
    	<subtitleList>
    	    <subtitle language="de">https://emptestdata.blob.core.windows.net/sources/shortbbb/bbb_ger_short.vtt</subtitle>
             <!-- No body means that they will be removed if they exist. -->
            <subtitle language="sv"/>
            <subtitle language="en"/>
    	</subtitleList>
    </material>
  </data>
</publish-metadata>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<publish-metadata xmlns="http://video-metadata.emp.ebsd.ericsson.net/publish-metadata/v1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://video-metadata.emp.ebsd.ericsson.net/publish-metadata/v1 publish-metadata-1.0.xsd">
  <data>
    <material>
    	<materialRef>{{materialId}}</materialRef>
    	<assetIdRef>{{assetId}}</assetIdRef>
		<DRMEnabled>true</DRMEnabled>
    </material>
  </data>
</publish-metadata>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<publish-metadata xmlns="http://video-metadata.emp.ebsd.ericsson.net/publish-metadata/v1">
    <data>
        <material>
            <materialRef>{{materialId}}</materialRef>
            <assetIdRef>{{assetId}}</assetIdRef>
            <dubList>
                <dub language="it" displayName="Italiano">
                    <filename>http://example.com/path/to/auido.mxf</filename>
                </dub>
            </dubList>
        </material>
    </data>
</publish-metadata>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<publish-metadata xmlns="http://video-metadata.emp.ebsd.ericsson.net/publish-metadata/v1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://video-metadata.emp.ebsd.ericsson.net/publish-metadata/v1 publish-metadata-1.0.xsd">
	<data>
		<asset>
    		<id>{{assetId}}</id>
    		<titleList>
    			<title language="en">Title for {{assetId}} in English</title>
    		</titleList>
    		<assetType>episode</assetType>
    		<seriesId>{{seriesId}}</seriesId>
    		<seasonId>{{seasonId}}</seasonId>
    		<episodeNumber>{{episodeNumber}}</episodeNumber>
        </asset>
        <material>
			<materialRef>https://emptestdata.blob.core.windows.net/sources/Sintel/sintel.mp4</materialRef>
			<DRMEnabled>true</DRMEnabled>
		</material>
	</data>
</publish-metadata>

request.description:
Use this when you want to perform a basic ingest without having any real meta-data available. You have one media file.

It is assumed that the there is a storage location defined inside RedBee platform. This is why providing only relative paths are good enough. A storage can be defined either for a whole organization unit or for an organization when a specific provider is defined for the material.

Asset will not be published.

item.description: The purpose of requests in the ingest folder is to describe different variants of ingest.

body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<publish-metadata xmlns="http://video-metadata.emp.ebsd.ericsson.net/publish-metadata/v1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://video-metadata.emp.ebsd.ericsson.net/publish-metadata/v1 publish-metadata.xsd">
    <data>
        <asset>
            <id>{{assetId}}</id>
            <titleList>
                <title language="en">Live2VOD From Editlist</title>
            </titleList>
            <assetType>movie</assetType>
        </asset>
        <material>
            <liveSource>
                <type>EDIT_LIST</type>
                <channelId>{{channelId}}</channelId>
                <segments>
                    <segment>
                        <start>2020-01-13T14:31:00.000Z</start>
                        <end>2020-01-13T14:32:00.000Z</end>
                    </segment>
                    <segment>
                        <start>2020-01-13T14:34:00.000Z</start>
                        <end>2020-01-13T14:35:00.000Z</end>
                    </segment>
                </segments>
            </liveSource>
            <DRMEnabled>false</DRMEnabled>
        </material>
        <publicationList>
            <publication>
                <id>{{assetId}}</id>
                <startTime>2019-10-18T12:00:00+00:00</startTime>
                <endTime>2020-10-18T12:00:00+00:00</endTime>
                <publicationRights>
                    <productList>
                        <product>{{productId}}</product>
                    </productList>
                </publicationRights>
            </publication>
        </publicationList>
    </data>
</publish-metadata>

request.description:
Use this when you want to create a VOD asset from a live source using an edit list.

Asset will be published. Note that this means that the asset might be available before it is actually ingested and playable so please consider the publication dates carefully.

body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<publish-metadata xmlns="http://video-metadata.emp.ebsd.ericsson.net/publish-metadata/v1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://video-metadata.emp.ebsd.ericsson.net/publish-metadata/v1 publish-metadata.xsd">
    <data>
        <asset>
            <id>{{assetId}}</id>
            <titleList>
                <title language="en">Live2VOD From Program {{programId}}</title>
            </titleList>
            <assetType>movie</assetType>
        </asset>
        <material>
            <liveSource>
                <type>EPG</type>
                <channelId>{{channelId}}</channelId>
                <programId>{{programId}}</programId>
            </liveSource>
            <DRMEnabled>false</DRMEnabled>
        </material>
        <publicationList>
            <publication>
                <id>{{assetId}}</id>
                <startTime>2020-01-24T00:00:00.000Z</startTime>
                <endTime>2025-01-24T00:00:00.000Z</endTime>
                <publishTime>2019-12-01T00:00:00.000Z</publishTime>
                <publicationRights>
                    <productList>
                        <product>{{productId}}</product>
                    </productList>
                </publicationRights>
            </publication>
        </publicationList>
    </data>
</publish-metadata>

request.description:
Use this when you want to create a VOD asset from a live program.

Asset will be published. Note that this means that the asset might be available before it is actually ingested and playable so please consider the publication dates carefully.

body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<publish-metadata xmlns="http://video-metadata.emp.ebsd.ericsson.net/publish-metadata/v1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://video-metadata.emp.ebsd.ericsson.net/publish-metadata/v1 publish-metadata.xsd">
    <data>
        <asset>
            <id>{{assetId}}</id>
            <titleList>
                <title language="en">Vod2Vod</title>
            </titleList>
	       <assetType>movie</assetType>
        </asset>
        <material>
            <vodSource>
                <segments>
                    <segment>
                        <sourceAssetId>{{assetId}}</sourceAssetId>
                    	<sourceMaterialId>{{materialId}}</sourceMaterialId>
                        <start>PT1M10S</start>
                        <end>PT10M43S</end>
                    </segment>
                </segments>
            </vodSource>
            <DRMEnabled>false</DRMEnabled>
        </material>
    </data>
</publish-metadata>

request.description:
Use this when you want to create a VOD asset from a live source using an edit list.

Asset will be published. Note that this means that the asset might be available before it is actually ingested and playable so please consider the publication dates carefully.

body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<publish-metadata xmlns="http://video-metadata.emp.ebsd.ericsson.net/publish-metadata/v1">
	<data>
		<material>
			<vodSource>
				<segments>
					<segment>
						<sourceAssetId>{{assetId}}</sourceAssetId>
                        <sourceMaterialId>{{materialId}}</sourceMaterialId>
						<start>P0Y0M0DT0H0M10.000S</start>
						<end>P0Y0M0DT0H0M20.000S</end>
					</segment>
				</segments>
			</vodSource>
			<assetIdRef>{{assetId}}</assetIdRef>
			<DRMEnabled>false</DRMEnabled>
		</material>
	</data>
</publish-metadata>

request.description: Use this this base a new material on a already existing one to avoid incurring extra transcoding and storage costs

body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<publish-metadata xmlns="http://video-metadata.emp.ebsd.ericsson.net/publish-metadata/v1">
    <data>
        <asset>
            <id>{{assetId}}</id>
            <assetName>Special Asset name</assetName>
            <assetType>movie</assetType>
        </asset>
        <material>
            <provider>RTBF</provider>
            <externalEncoding>
                <source type="STORAGE" removeAfterIngest="false">pre-define</source>
                <videoTracks>
                    <videoTrack>
                        <filename>2143828/2dCIeQjn5O-234p.mp4</filename>
                        <outputFilename>H264_video_234p_200000.mp4</outputFilename>
                        <targetBitrate>200000</targetBitrate>
                        <codec>H264</codec>
                    </videoTrack>
                    <videoTrack>
                        <filename>2143828/2dCIeQjn5O-480p.mp4</filename>
                        <outputFilename>H264_video_480p_1150000.mp4</outputFilename>
                        <targetBitrate>1150000</targetBitrate>
                        <codec>H264</codec>
                    </videoTrack>
                    <videoTrack>
                        <filename>2143828/2dCIeQjn5O-576p.mp4</filename>
                        <outputFilename>H264_video_576p_1600000.mp4</outputFilename>
                        <targetBitrate>1600000</targetBitrate>
                        <codec>H264</codec>
                    </videoTrack>
                    <videoTrack>
                        <filename>2143828/2dCIeQjn5O-720p.mp4</filename>
                        <outputFilename>H264_video_720p_200000.mp4</outputFilename>
                        <targetBitrate>2000000</targetBitrate>
                        <codec>H264</codec>
                    </videoTrack>
                    <videoTrack>
                        <filename>2143828/2dCIeQjn5O-1080p.mp4</filename>
                        <outputFilename>H264_video_1080p_4000000.mp4</outputFilename>
                        <targetBitrate>4000000</targetBitrate>
                        <codec>H264</codec>
                    </videoTrack>
                </videoTracks>
                <audioTracks>
                    <audioTrack>
                        <filename>2143828/2dCIeQjn5O-234p.mp4</filename>
                        <outputFilename>aac_audio_fre_96000.mp4</outputFilename>
                        <targetBitrate>96000</targetBitrate>
                        <displayName>Français</displayName>
                        <language>fr</language>
                        <codec>AAC</codec>
                        <channels>2</channels>
                    </audioTrack>
                    <audioTrack>
                        <filename>2143828/2dCIeQjn5O-480p.mp4</filename>
                        <outputFilename>aac_audio_fre_128000.mp4</outputFilename>
                        <targetBitrate>128000</targetBitrate>
                        <displayName>Français</displayName>
                        <language>fr</language>

                        <channels>2</channels>
                    </audioTrack>
                    <audioTrack>
                        <filename>2143828/2dCIeQjn5O-720p.mp4</filename>
                        <outputFilename>aac_audio_fre_192000.mp4</outputFilename>

            </externalEncoding>
            <DRMEnabled>false</DRMEnabled>
            <subtitleList>
                <subtitle language="fr" name="Français">2143828/fra.vtt</subtitle>
                <subtitle language="en" name="English">2143828/eng.vtt</subtitle>
            </subtitleList>
            <purgeDate>2030-12-17T00:00:00+01:00</purgeDate>
        </material>
    </data>
</publish-metadata>

item.description:
Example of different ingests. Different type of ingests can be done into the RedBee platform. 

Standard Ingest - This is a standard VOD ingest, having source files available on internet or on a storage available to RedBee.

Live2VOF Ingst - This will create a VOD based on a live channel program.

item.name: Meta-Data Updates

body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<publish-metadata xmlns="http://video-metadata.emp.ebsd.ericsson.net/publish-metadata/v1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://video-metadata.emp.ebsd.ericsson.net/publish-metadata/v1 publish-metadata-1.0.xsd">
    <data>
        <asset>
            <id>{{assetId}}</id>
            <!-- The provider must be configured in the system -->
            <provider>provider1</provider>
            <productionYear>2017</productionYear>
            <titleList>
                <title language="en">Title for {{assetId}} in Englisth</title>
                <title language="sv">Title for {{assetId}} in Swedish</title>
            </titleList>
            <descriptionList>
                <description language="en" length="short">A short description in English</description>
                <description language="sv" length="short">A short description in Swedish</description>
                <description language="en" length="medium">A medium description in English</description>
                <description language="sv" length="medium">A medium description in Swedish</description>
                <description language="en" length="long">A long description in English</description>
                <description language="sv" length="long">A long description in Swedish</description>
            </descriptionList>
            <!-- The tags must exist -->
            <tagList>
                <tagIdRef>genre_drama</tagIdRef>
                <tagIdRef>genre_thriller</tagIdRef>
            </tagList>
            <imageList>
            	 <image language="sv">
                    <id>image1</id>
                    <url>http://myhost.se/myPath/MyImageInSv.jpg</url>
                    <width>1280</width>
                    <height>720</height>
                    <purpose>banner</purpose>
                    <orientation>landscape</orientation>
                </image>
                <image language="en">
                    <id>image2</id>
                    <url>http://myhost.se/myPath/MyImageInEn.jpg</url>
                    <width>1280</width>
                    <height>720</height>
                    <purpose>banner</purpose>
                    <orientation>landscape</orientation>
                </image>
            </imageList>
            <!-- The parantal ratings must be pre-configured in the system -->
            <parentalRatingList>
                <parentalRating>
                    <rating>15</rating>
                    <scheme>age</scheme>
                    <country>GB</country>
                </parentalRating>
                <parentalRating>
                    <rating>15</rating>
                    <scheme>age</scheme>
                    <country>SE</country>
                </parentalRating>
            </parentalRatingList>
            <assetType>movie</assetType>
        </asset>
    </data>
</publish-metadata>

request.description: Use this when you want to create or update meta-data for an asset.

                <title language="en">Season title for {{seasonId}} in English</title>
                <title language="sv">Season titel för {{seasonId}} på Svenska</title>
            </titleList>
            <descriptionList>
                <description language="en" length="short">A short season description in English</description>
                <description language="sv" length="short">A short season description in Swedish</description>
                <description language="en" length="medium">A medium season description in English</description>
                <description language="sv" length="medium">A medium season description in Swedish</description>
                <description language="en" length="long">A long season description in English</description>
                <description language="sv" length="long">A long season description in Swedish</description>
            </descriptionList>
            <tagList/>
            <imageList>
                <image language="sv">
                    <id>image1</id>
                    <url>http://myhost.se/myPath/MyImageInSv.jpg</url>
                    <purpose>banner</purpose>
                    <orientation>landscape</orientation>
                </image>
                <image language="en">
                    <id>image2</id>
                    <url>http://myhost.se/myPath/MyImageInEn.jpg</url>
                    <purpose>banner</purpose>
                    <orientation>landscape</orientation>
                </image>
            </imageList>
            <seriesId>{{seasonId}}</seriesId>
            <seasonNumber>1</seasonNumber>
            <numberOfEpisodes>26</numberOfEpisodes>
        </season>
    </data>
</publish-metadata>

                <description language="sv" length="short">A short series description in Swedish</description>
                <description language="en" length="medium">A medium series description in English</description>
                <description language="sv" length="medium">A medium series description in Swedish</description>
                <description language="en" length="long">A long series description in English</description>

                    <url>http://myhost.se/myPath/MyImageInEn.jpg</url>
                    <purpose>banner</purpose>
                    <orientation>landscape</orientation>
                </image>
            </imageList>
        </series>
    </data>
</publish-metadata>

request.description: Use this when you want to create or update meta-data for an asset.

item.description: If you don't have the media files available yet you can still create the asset and start to work on the meta-data. You can also update the update later, before or after the media files are actually ingested. The message to send in is the same as for a ingest resulting in a transcoding, the difference is that you do not provide a material.

item.name: Publications

body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<publish-metadata xmlns="http://video-metadata.emp.ebsd.ericsson.net/publish-metadata/v1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://video-metadata.emp.ebsd.ericsson.net/publish-metadata/v1 publish-metadata-1.0.xsd">
    <data>
        <publicationList>
            <publication>
                <id>{{assetId}}</id>
                <assetIdRef>{{assetId}}</assetIdRef>
                <startTime>2020-01-24T00:00:00.000Z</startTime>
                <endTime>2025-01-24T00:00:00.000Z</endTime>
                <publishTime>2019-12-01T00:00:00.000Z</publishTime>
                <publicationRights>
                    <productList>
                        <product>{{productId}}</product>
                    </productList>
                </publicationRights>
            </publication>
        </publicationList>
    </data>
</publish-metadata>

request.description: Use this when you want to add or update a publication for an asset.
Use this when you want to add or update a publication for an asset.

item.description: You can at any point add or change your publications. If a publication with your provided ID already exist for an asset it will be replaced, otherwise it will be added.
